sys_ui_action.comments:
Action is a copy of the global Edit... button for M2M. Using the exact same Action name "sysverb_edit_m2m" overrides the global button, and somehow makes the form work. Using a different Action name errors on "no record selected."
This was in global button condition. Not required here as this is for a specific m2m table: (new GlideRecord(current.getTableName())).canCreate() && RP.isManyToMany() && !RP.getListControl().isOmitEditButton()
